invalid_text.title: ¡Las reglas del MCMETA son inválidas!
invalid_text.description: Errores comunes incluyen no entrecomillando las propiedades dos veces o colocando mal un carácter.

invalid_file.title: ¡Archivo MCMETA inválido!
invalid_file.description: No se ha encontrado ninguna función `animation` en el archivo. Compruebe que cargó el archivo correcto.

unbannable.title: This user cannot be botbanned!
unbannable.description: You cannot botban yourself, a developer, or someone with administrator permissions.

in_submission.title: You cannot run slash commands in a submission channel!
in_submission.description: Please use the appropriate bot command channel instead.

images.too_big: This image is too big to %ACTION%!
images.too_long: This image is too long to animate!
images.max_size: The maximum size for an image is 1024px².
images.max_length: The maximum length for a tilesheet is 32 frames.
images.suggestion: Make sure you uploaded an image, replied to a valid image, used a valid image URL, or were in the correct channel.

embed.need_more_info: You need to have either a description or title for an embed.

texture.not_found: No results were found for %TEXTURENAME%. Have you made a typo?

info.title: Hi, I'm CompliBot. I was made for the Faithful Discord servers.
info.subtitle: And I think I turned out pretty well.

features.title: Features
features.description:
- Real-time texture interaction using `/texture`, `/compare`, and `/cycle`.
- Check resource pack progress with `/missing` or check your contributions with `/about`.
- Image manipulation utilities such as `/magnify`, `/tile`, `/palette`, and `/animate`.

developing.title: Developing
developing.description:
I'm fully open source (written in TypeScript and Discord.js) and can be cloned at my GitHub repository [here](https://github.com/faithful-resource-pack/complibot).

If you're interested in developing, contact <@!473860522710794250>, <@!360249987927638016>, or <@!173336582265241601> for more information.
